txt.en: 'Everyday, I find myself astounded by the sheer numbers of the huge, fungus-infected spiders we see near the Shadowed Refuge. If you wish to be of aid to us all, you would help us destroy them!\n\n'They are found everywhere, but most especially around Tunzelgund, east of here. With your aid, their numbers should gradually dwindle.'
'Ha! That's good news all around! That's one hundred and twelve legs that won't be twitching through MY nightmares anymore! \n\n'Thank you, [placeholder]. My most sincere thanks!'
'The spiders are in the tunnels east of here at Tunzelgund.\n\n'I cannot abide those awful things. Anything with more than four limbs and a tail just horrifies me, deep down.'
It is a constant struggle to keep the overwhelming numbers of the spiders to a minimum.
Spiders may be found around Tunzelgund, east of the Shadowed Refuge.\n\nKlintur has asked you to defeat many spiders in the Foundations of Stone.
Talk to Klintur at the Shadowed Refuge
Klintur can be found at the Shadowed Refuge, west from Tunzelgund.\n\nYou should return to Klintur with news of your success.
